alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 07 at 3:26PM EST until January 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, bringing snow totals of 6 to 12 inches in the most-persistent snow. Localized greater totals possible. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga and Cuyahoga counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and near-zero visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest storm-total snowfall is expected east of I-77 in Cuyahoga County, south of I-90 in Lake County, and across Geauga County. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4200 7962 4210 7975 4192 8028 4221 7976 4224 7988 4217 8012 4168 8143 4149 8172 4160 8123 4144 8111 TIME Y22M01D07T1800Z-Y22M01D08T1200Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
